greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Signature permutation of a Catalan bijection: The inverse of A154455.
comment: This automorphism of rooted plane binary trees switches the two descendant trees for every other vertex as it descends along the 000... ray, starting swapping already at the root. Specifically, *A154456 = psi(A154446), where the isomorphism psi is given in A153141 (see further comments there).
link: A. Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2055
Index entries for signature-permutations of Catalan automorphisms
program: (Scheme function, destructive implementation of this automorphism acting on S-expressions:) (define (*A154456! s) (cond ((pair? s) (*A069770! s) (*A154454! (car s)))) s)
xref: Differs from A082346 and A122328 for the first time at n=26, where a(26)=49, while A082346(26)=A122328(26)=50. Differs from A129611 for the first time at n=91, where a(91)=196, while A129611(91)=195.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 17 2009
